basics.name: Carlos Alfonso Hernandez Rojas
basics.label: Junior Frontend and Backend Developer | IT Consultant
basics.summary:
I am a professional with two years of experience in web development, focusing primarily on technologies such as React, Next.js, and Astro. I have contributed to the development and maintenance of modern and dynamic web applications, with a strong emphasis on creating responsive and user-friendly interfaces.
 Additionally, I have experience in developing APIs using Python and JavaScript, specializing in system integration through REST APIs.
 My professional journey reflects a unique combination of technical skills in web and backend development, along with essential administrative abilities to ensure efficient operation of technological systems within the company.

work.name: Niuko Consultores
work.summary: In my current role, I oversee operations at the Querétaro offices and actively collaborate with those in San Luis Potosí, playing an integral role in the IT department. In addition to providing technical support, I am responsible for license management, inventory control, and the administration of the private server for Compaq services and support. I specialize in the configuration and management of Fortinet devices and develop specific web solutions to optimize internal processes and improve operational efficiency. Furthermore, I manage networks and supervise structured cabling, among other key responsibilities.
highlights: Implemented and created the application service for hours control
Collaborated in performance improvement on the company's website
Collaborated on a chatbot for ticket support within the company

work.name: Carls Jr.
work.summary: I supervised the proper operation of the branch, ensuring the quality of products and customer service, as well as training and supervising staff.
highlights: Trained staff for the proper operation of the branch
Assisted in structured cabling at the branch

projects.name: Blog
projects.description: The goal is to update, enhance, and maintain the company's blog to attract new customers and keep current ones informed. Implementing new features and improvements in the user interface, an easy way to make publications
